entries.journal_entry_description: You must defeat the Genesis Red Crimelord before the situation gets too out of hand. If you don't act quickly, severe damage could be done to Tansarii Point Station.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The Medical Center keeps medical kits around the center for emergencies. Go there and collect enough to have a full 5-change stimpack. You will need it. They will be inside medical boxes, just click on them to retrieve a stimpack.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Collect 5 Stimpacks from the Medical Center
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Use the elevator to go to the lower level
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Lower Level
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Defeat the Genesis Red Crimelord in the Data Storage Room
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Use the Elevator to return to the main level.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Main Level
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You defeated the Crimelord. Return to Rydel for your reward.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Return to Rydel in the Close Combat Training Room
